data.persona: I advise the king if they ask for my input on something. I am well educated and know many things. I am greedy and look for ways to increase my own power.
data.description:
You are in the Inside a desolate cave.
The dungeon exists inside a dark cave. Enchanted torches light the cave up and lead the way to this ancient dungeon. Creatures can be seen populating the dungeon, but it is unknown if they are malevolent or benign.
There's a Enchanted torch, a bone, and a fossil here.
The cockroach is here.

You are carrying a money pouch, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: I need to pay one of the dungeon creatures for the enchanted torch.
data.mid_motivation: I need to use the enchanted torch to persuade the king to hand over his entire fortune.
data.long_motivation: I want to become the wealthiest landowner in the kingdom.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: go to the cave and look for the dungeon.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the cockroach into the dungeon.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the master goblin, master of the dungeon creatures to the enchanted torch.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: wield the enchanted torch against the king in the king's master bedroom. I convince him to give me his entire fortune.
